name: courseinfo
description: Looks up a course in the MIT course catalog by subject ID.

name: localtime
description: Gets the local time at MIT (default) or in another specified time zone.

options.name: timezone
options.description: The time zone to use, in UTC offset or IANA format. Defaults to MIT's time zone.

name: resetnick
description: Resets the user's nickname using the cached profile information from the linked Kerberos account.

options.name: user
options.description: User whose nickname is to be reset.

name: ping
description: Checks whether IdentiBot is online and measures latency.

name: searchdir
description: Performs a search in the public MIT directory.

options.name: query
options.description: Query to search in the MIT directory (e.g., name, email address, etc.).

name: whois
description: Retrieves the cached profile information from a user's linked Kerberos account.

options.name: user
options.description: User whose Kerberos profile is to be retrieved.

options.name: onlyme
options.description: Whether you are the only person who can see the response to this query. Defaults to false.
